attributes.action: Stop banning women from a job they have chosen to do !
attributes.background: Grid girls, walk on girls and glamorous models have been part of the entertainment industry for many many years , a lot of this models rely on this work to be able to follow their dreams and careers weather paying for their university, having the flexibility to go on castings

rejection.details: This is a decision made by employers, not an action that the UK Government and Parliament have taken.
